name: Fright Night (julie k!)
description:
Fright Night by Anika Mahajan, Justin Beedle, and Julie Khou

You and your friend make a bet at the Santa Cruz Boardwalk on Halloween night. The goal?

One free taco. 

In the struggle to win, you must use your mouse to scour the crowded Boardwalk and click on your friend. Your friend will use the arrow keys to move amongst the crowd. 

You only have until closing before the winner claims their taco..



Contributions:

  • Programmers: Anika Mahajan & Julie Khou
  • Artist: Justin Beedle
  • Sounds: Anika Mahajan, Brandon Kuo, & Evan Chen
